title: mirek92
author: mirek92
content: Hello,Do you know any service like Coin Market Cap but which is only about meme coins or shitcoins?Thank you for reply

comments.author: GreatArkansas
comments.body: You can try Coingecko or Coinpaprika but using categories.You can find most of these shitcoins or altcoins by these platforms by just filtering them by category, I believe most of the platforms that coinmarketcap related got this function.I also suggest using a reputable platform so you can guarantee that data are somehow accurate.

comments.author: $crypto$
comments.body: Coinmarketcap - https://coinmarketcap.com/id/view/memes/Coingecko - https://www.coingecko.com/id/categories/meme-tokenThat is a list of meme coin services from the best Coinmarketcap, of course you have to choose and find them according to the criteria.I think the meme coin list is exhaustive to look for.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: Just as posted above, you can just google search them and tag them with the keyword of "meme tokens list" and all of them will appear on your search. And these are the others that have popped up for the results.(https://cryptoslate.com/cryptos/meme/)(https://crypto.com/price/categories/memes)

comments.author: ninis45
comments.body: Quote from: $crypto$ on June 25, 2022, 11:36:08 AMCoinmarketcap - https://coinmarketcap.com/id/view/memes/Coingecko - https://www.coingecko.com/id/categories/meme-tokenThat is a list of meme coin services from the best Coinmarketcap, of course you have to choose and find them according to the criteria.I think the meme coin list is exhaustive to look for.I think the two sites are enough to view and search for a coin, altcoin and even memecoin because both are references that can see information about project details, whether they are already running or still doing presale and it is undeniable that the accuracy of the information reaches 90% in my personal opinion.

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: You can use this site [1] click the price header and it will sort the shitcoins which worth below $0.00000001 appeared. I think the shitcoins you refer is those coins that had low values and almost dead isn't? if we talking about the use cases, then most of altcoins is shitcoins no matter what the rank is. As you can see on the top 10 coins on CMC or any crypto compilation list had a shitcoins.[1] https://www.livecoinwatch.com/

comments.author: lobo13hf
comments.body: This must be https://poocoin.app/ Poocion is fully dedicated for the shit token and meme token. Mostly of meme tokens were not listed on the CMC has been listed on this site. So many shit tokens creators were also using this site as coinmarketcap alternative. I think that you can try to take a look on it. The reputation of poocoin among the shit token users were good enough.

comments.author: TheUltraElite
comments.body: Quote from: lobo13hf on June 27, 2022, 02:33:54 PMPoocion is fully dedicated for the shit token and meme token. Mostly of meme tokens were not listed on the CMC has been listed on this site. So many shit tokens creators were also using this site as coinmarketcap alternative. I think that you can try to take a look on it. I cant believe that there is a site of that name being run on the internet for shitcoins in real. In all seriousness, these coins are never going to get quoted on CMC or CGecko which means that even searching or attempting to accumulate them over time is a futile venture. Only the bagholders who got those coins at very cheap prices will dump their coins one fine day and the enthusiastic owners will be suffering the losses.QuoteThe reputation of poocoin among the shit token users were good enough.Â   For such insight, take a bow sir, take a bow.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: Quote from: mirek92 on June 25, 2022, 10:02:19 AMHello,Do you know any service like Coin Market Cap but which is only about meme coins or shitcoins?Thank you for replyWhy only for memecoin and shitcoins? Coinmarketcap and coingecko already can supply you that. But Im not sure if there are sites that focus only on this but instead providing general or all infos on different coins and tokens they listed.In some telegram group there are signals and update but for a site that only look on that not really sure. There is category anyway on coingecko for different group might wanna check if there is shitcoin list only.

comments.author: mexite
comments.body: I don't think there's any coin tracking website that js entirely dedicated to shitcoins. As a matter of fact, many shitcoins don't even make it to CG or CMC. Most meme tokens and some DeFi tokens are nothing but shitcoins. You may track listed shitcoins on Poocoin or you use CMC alternatives like Coinlib, Coin rate, coincheckup, etc.

comments.author: livingfree
comments.body: Quote from: mexite on July 21, 2022, 10:47:43 PMI don't think there's any coin tracking website that js entirely dedicated to shitcoins. As a matter of fact, many shitcoins don't even make it to CG or CMC. Most meme tokens and some DeFi tokens are nothing but shitcoins. You may track listed shitcoins on Poocoin or you use CMC alternatives like Coinlib, Coin rate, coincheckup, etc. Sort of but if we remove the dedicated shitcoins listing only, there are too many of them and you've just mentioned many of them. They're not entirely dedicated to it but they have the lists for it.Just like what were posted, they create a certain section and classification for those type of projects so that a visitor would have to looked it easily through that tab.Although OP looks for certain only for it, poocoin would be the most ideal of it if OP really bothers to see only shitcoins.

comments.author: Jawhead999
comments.body: Quote from: mexite on July 21, 2022, 10:47:43 PMI don't think there's any coin tracking website that js entirely dedicated to shitcoins. As a matter of fact, many shitcoins don't even make it to CG or CMC. Most meme tokens and some DeFi tokens are nothing but shitcoins. You may track listed shitcoins on Poocoin or you use CMC alternatives like Coinlib, Coin rate, coincheckup, etc. Lol, both Coingecko and Coinmarketcap are fan of listing shitcoins on their sites, they're not monitoring the projects. If the project are able to pay the fees to get listed on Coingecko and Coinmarketcap, fulfill the requirements etc, it will be listed. Currently there's around 20K coins listed on those sites, it's full of shitcoins. There's only 3 genuine coins AFAIK e.g. Bitcoin, Monero, and DAI. The rest 99% are just shitcoins and shouldn't be listed.

comments.author: X-ray
comments.body: Quote from: mexite on July 21, 2022, 10:47:43 PMI don't think there's any coin tracking website that js entirely dedicated to shitcoins. As a matter of fact, many shitcoins don't even make it to CG or CMC. Most meme tokens and some DeFi tokens are nothing but shitcoins. You may track listed shitcoins on Poocoin or you use CMC alternatives like Coinlib, Coin rate, coincheckup, etc. Tens of shit coins being listed on CG and CMC everyday. Hundreds till thousands of shit coins going dead in every season once the market became the bearish trend. Most of shit tokens were also sending so many applications to the CG and CMC as well. All of crypto tracking sites were also able to be used to track the shit coins. These days after CMC already acquired by binance and it has become a free listing site. Shit scam coin developers were able listing their coins on CMC for free.

comments.author: ninis45
comments.body: in essence if the OP is looking for a site that is dedicated to tracking developments and other info from a shit/memecoin, I personally have never found it except that global info on all cryptos has been found and the most common ones can be accessed at CMC and CG
